items.content_html: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

items.content_html: A frontend-only Patient Registration App built with React and PGlite. It allows users to register patients, run raw SQL queries, persist data using IndexedDB, and sync updates across multiple browser tabs—all without a backend. Lightweight, responsive, and fully functional in the browser.
items.title: Jaya-ask/patient-registration-app: A frontend-only Patient Registration App built with React and PGlite. It allows users to register patients, run raw SQL queries, persist data using IndexedDB, and sync updates across multiple browser tabs—all without a backend. Lightweight, responsive, and fully functional in the browser.
